title: The Power of Magnets
description: The Power of Magnets introduces the reader to the science behind magnets. Through examples and a hands-on activity that encourages students to make their own magnet, readers will learn about the practical applications of magnets. Photographs and diagrams support the text.
highFrequencyWords: attracts, code, current, electricity, force, generators, invisible, magnetism, repel
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Long Vowels : Identify long /i/ (as in -ight) word family
awareness: Commas                : Identify and use commas in a series
phonics: Alphabetizing                : Arrange words in alphabetical order
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
